name: Prototype_Game
description:
Prototype_Game:

A rogue-like third-person shooter where your aim is restricted to horizontal movement that takes place in a constantly generating open world. Battle strange robotic enemies while exploring all of the game's biomes. Made as a high school project in 2022 for the advanced programming topic course, this game was made in a semester and was one of the first full games I've made.

Controls:

W - Forward          Space - jump

A - Left                      L - Open Upgrade Menu

S - Backward         L-Shift - Boost 

D - Right                   Esc - Pause

Info:

GitHub: https://github.com/Alexdlc5
